## hpr0477 :: Uber Leet Hacker Force Radio

 AUTHOR: SigFLUP 

TITLE: Uber Leet Hacker Force Radio issue 1

DESCRIPTION: 
In this issue of Uber Leet Hacker Force Radio SigFLUP releases a helpful patch to gnu-screen. Show notes include https://hobones.dogsoft.net/screen-4.0.3-ulhf.1.tar.gz and https://hobones.dogsoft.net/ulhf_patch1.tgz
 
You may contact us at pantsbutt@gmail.com
